languages.text: По словам паломников на Футфоле, некий мир у холодной звезды в Цинерус Малефикум достиг таких духовных высот, что Император вознес все население в свои чертоги.
According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.
languages.original_text: По словам паломников на Футфоле, некий мир у холодной звезды в Цинерус Малефикум достиг таких духовных высот, что Император вознес все население в свои чертоги.

traits.locale_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.
According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.
According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.
According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

languages.text: 根据落脚港朝圣者的说法，在苍灰恶咒某颗冰冷行星附近的世界中，那里的居民精神水平达到了相当的高度，所有人都被帝皇擢升到了祂的圣殿之中。
languages.original_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

traits.locale_text: 根据落脚港朝圣者的说法，在苍灰恶咒某颗冰冷行星附近的世界中，那里的居民精神水平达到了相当的高度，所有人都被帝皇擢升到了祂的圣殿之中。

languages.text: フットフォールの巡礼者らによると、サイネラス・マレフィカムの冷たき星の周辺にある惑星が精神的な高位に達し、皇帝は全国民をホールに呼び出したという。
languages.original_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールの巡礼者らによると、サイネラス・マレフィカムの冷たき星の周辺にある惑星が精神的な高位に達し、皇帝は全国民をホールに呼び出したという。

languages.text: Según peregrinos en Paso, un mundo situado cerca de una estrella fría del Cinerus Maleficum llegó a tan altas cotas espirituales que el propio Emperador elevó a la población para que se uniera a él en sus salones.
languages.original_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

traits.locale_text: Según peregrinos en Paso, un mundo situado cerca de una estrella fría del Cinerus Maleficum llegó a tan altas cotas espirituales que el propio Emperador elevó a la población para que se uniera a él en sus salones.

languages.text: Laut der Pilger auf Footfall hat eine Welt unweit eines erkalteten Sterns im Cinerus Maleficum derartige spirituelle Höhen erreicht, dass der Imperator sämtliche Bewohner in Seine heiligen Hallen aufgenommen hat.
languages.original_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

traits.locale_text: Laut der Pilger auf Footfall hat eine Welt unweit eines erkalteten Sterns im Cinerus Maleficum derartige spirituelle Höhen erreicht, dass der Imperator sämtliche Bewohner in Seine heiligen Hallen aufgenommen hat.

languages.text: D'après des pèlerins de Castel, un monde proche d'une étoile froide du Cinerus Maleficum a atteint une telle puissance spirituelle que l'Empereur a invité tous ses habitants à Le rejoindre dans Son palais.
languages.original_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

traits.locale_text: D'après des pèlerins de Castel, un monde proche d'une étoile froide du Cinerus Maleficum a atteint une telle puissance spirituelle que l'Empereur a invité tous ses habitants à Le rejoindre dans Son palais.

languages.text: Binliman'daki hacılara göre Cinerus Maleficum'da bulunan soğuk bir yıldızın yakınındaki bir dünya, ruhani olarak erecek bir seviyeye ulaşmış; İmparator da tüm halkı göğe çıkartarak kendi salonlarına buyur etmiş.
languages.original_text: According to pilgrims on Footfall, one world near a cold star in the Cinerus Maleficum reached such spiritual heights that the Emperor raised up all its people to join Him in His halls.

traits.locale_text: Binliman'daki seyyahlara göre Cinerus Maleficum'da bulunan soğuk bir yıldızın yakınındaki bir dünya, ruhani olarak erecek bir seviyeye ulaşmış ve İmparator, tüm halkı göğe çıkartarak kendi salonlarına buyur etmiş.
